author: Rachel Miller, Amy Rose Spiegel, Casey Johnston
title: During Bad Times, 'Don't Look Down' Is the Advice I Turn To Most
description: When you feel like you're about to fall into a pit of unknown horrors, keep steady—and think smaller.
content: One of the most useful reminders in my Bad Times toolbox is the phrase "Don't look down"meaning, briefly, stay focused on the task at hand instead of all the creative ways I could crash and burn. It was something I repeated to myself a lot during my divorce i… [+7094 chars]
